participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and open-minded, I love exploring new activities and enjoy expressing myself through music.
participant_1.background: I enjoy trying new things and my favorite foods are sushi and pizza. I never eat veggies. I prefer baseball over football. I spent a lot of time last year listening to The Muggers and trying to produce music myself. I am gay but I have not told my parents yet.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Curious and responsible, I have a strong interest in learning and value trust in my interactions.
participant_2.background: I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business. I am fairly conservative in politics. I am twenty years old. I love to eat sushi and pizza. I value honesty and trust in my relationships.

content.text: Pizza and sushi! I love how they can be so different, but both so delicious. What about you?
Me too! I'm a huge fan of both. I love how creative you can get with pizza, and sushi is always a nice, light meal.
Do you have a favorite pizza place?
I love Papa John's! Their pizza is always so fresh and flavorful. And I love their garlic sauce. What about you?
I'm a big fan of Domino's. I love their garlic knots and their cheesy bread.
I love Domino's cheesy bread! I'm not sure if they have it at my local Papa John's, but I'll have to check it out next time I'm there.
You definitely should! It's so good.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to play video games, listen to music, and watch movies. What about you?
I love to do all of those things too! I also like to go out with my friends and play sports.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I wish I had more friends to go out with.
You should try joining a club or group! That's a great way to meet new people and make friends.
That's a good idea. I'll have to look into it.
I hope you do! It's a lot of fun.
